amendment.description: To repeal certain requirements and limitations relating to the defense industrial base.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3319 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3319 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator McCain. (consideration: S7152-7160; text: CR S7158) To repeal certain requirements and limitations relating to the defense industrial base.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3319 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3319 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator McCain.
